alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 11:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WAKULLA...SOUTHEASTERN GADSDEN...SOUTHEASTERN LIBERTY...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...WEST CENTRAL TAYLOR...SOUTHWESTERN LEON AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM EDT... At 1143 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tallahassee Community College, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, Florida State University, St. Marks, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Quincy, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Jewel Fire Tower, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Royal Bluff, and Wakulla Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Liberty
